com.jrefinery.chart
Interface CategoryPlot

All Known Implementing Classes:
BarPlot, LinePlot
public interface CategoryPlot

The interface through which axes can communicate with a plot to determine the positioning of categories (which will depend on the visual representation used by the plot);

Plots that implement this interface include BarPlot and LinePlot.

See Also:
BarPlot, LinePlot

Method Summary
 java.util.List getCategories()
          A convenience method that returns a list of the categories in the data source.
 double getCategoryCoordinate(int categoryIndex, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D area)
          Returns the x or y coordinate (depending on the orientation of the plot) in Java 2D User Space of the center of the specified category.
 com.jrefinery.chart.CategoryDataset getDataset()
          A convenience method that returns the data source for the plot, cast as a CategoryDataSource.
 

Method Detail

getCategories

public java.util.List getCategories()
A convenience method that returns a list of the categories in the data source.

getCategoryCoordinate

public double getCategoryCoordinate(int categoryIndex,
                                    java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D area)
Returns the x or y coordinate (depending on the orientation of the plot) in Java 2D User Space of the center of the specified category.
Parameters:
categoryIndex - The index of the category of interest (first category index = 0);
area - The region within which the plot will be drawn;

getDataset

public com.jrefinery.chart.CategoryDataset getDataset()
A convenience method that returns the data source for the plot, cast as a CategoryDataSource.
